GSD.product_version: versions from v3.7 to before v5.4.189
GSD.description:
media: stk1160: If start stream fails, return buffers with VB2_BUF_STATE_QUEUED

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.189 by commit 3cc050df73e3d973f1870a8dc0e177e77670bc7f, it was introduced in version v3.7 by commit 8ac456495a33d9466076fea94594181ceefb76d9. For more details please see the references link.
